Speaking now on the Senate floor about the threat of Russian interference in our elections. Congress should quickly pass the #DETERAct, my bill to ensure any interference in future elections will be met with tough sanctions. Watch live: https://www.senate.gov/floor/

Earlier this year, along with Senator @ChrisVanHollen, I proposed the DETER Act. The only thing that Vladimir Putin understands is deterrence. Russian meddling will happen if we do not deter it from happening. https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm?p=Press-Releases&id=3B2B5EB6-0CAC-4C46-B5B6-3A6DC161B432

RT @Amy_Siskind A reminder that Donald Jr had dinner with Butina, a Russian spy who was indicted today - shortly before he hosted the June 9 meeting at Trump Tower with more Russians.

Yesterday, Trump told Putin he's free to, once again, attack our democracy in the 2018 elections. 

How do House Republicans respond? By proposing measures that would weaken states' election systems. 

It's time they put country over party.

The REUNITE Act:
✅ Requires immediate reunification of children who remain separated
✅ Ensures parents will not be charged outrageous fees to reunite with their children
✅ Requires DHS & HHS to publish guidance describing how they will reunify families

I’ve just introduced the REUNITE Act, a bill to immediately reunify all children who were separated from their parents at the border, ensure families will not be reunited in jail & establish a permanent system to protect detained immigrants with children. We are better than this.
